name: Bloodwood "Blinky" Button - Set of 2
description:
Blinky is two buttons in one: he can be a pretty tulip or rotated into an iconic ghost. You decide!

The buttons are made of wood from the bloodwood tree, native to South and Central America. The wood is an intense red with brown graining.

Each button is hand sanded, finished with tung oil, and polished to a subtle shine with a protective wax. Due to the handmade nature of these buttons, slight variations in size and graining may occur.

Approximate Dimensions:
7/8"w x 1 1/8"h x 1/8"d

name: Cocobolo "Sara" Button - Set of 2
description:
Our Sara buttons are a three-cornered approach to finishing your next project.

The buttons are made of wood from the Cocobolo tree of Central America. The wood is a warm, chocolatey brown with reddish-orange striping.

Each button is hand sanded, finished with tung oil, and polished to a subtle shine with a protective wax. Due to the handmade nature of these buttons, slight variations in size and graining may occur.

Approximate Dimensions:
1 3/8"w x 1/2"h x 1/8"d

name: Cocobolo "Corby" Button - Set of 2
description:
The Corby button is an abstract bowtie to fulfill all of your mid-century modern desires.

The buttons are made of wood from the Cocobolo tree of Central America. The wood is a warm, chocolatey brown with reddish-orange striping.

Each button is hand sanded, finished with tung oil, and polished to a subtle shine with a protective wax. Due to the handmade nature of these buttons, slight variations in size and graining may occur.

Approximate Dimensions:
1 1/2"w x 1/2 "h x 1/8"d

name: Cocobolo "Moby" Whale Buttons - Set of 2
description:
Moby is a lovable whale button that would be happy to swim onto your next project!

The buttons are made of wood from the Cocobolo tree of Central America. The wood is a warm, chocolatey brown with reddish-orange striping.

Each button is hand sanded, finished with tung oil, and polished to a subtle shine with a protective wax. Due to the handmade nature of these buttons, slight variations in size and graining may occur.

Approximate Dimensions:
1 7/8"w x 7/8"h x 1/8"d
